tool_description: An API for multiple mobile app stores: Android apps on Google Play and iOS apps on Apple iTunes. Low-cost pricing and fast response times.
name: App Stores
title: App Stores

api_list.name: App search
api_list.description: Fetch the list of search results for a given term

required_parameters.name: store
required_parameters.description: The app store that you would like to retrieve reviews from (apple or google)

required_parameters.name: term
required_parameters.description: The search term you would like to retrieve app results for

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: The two-letter code for the language you want results in (ISO-639-1). Optional

api_list.name: User reviews
api_list.description: Fetch the most recent user reviews for a given application

required_parameters.name: store
required_parameters.description: The app store that you would like to retrieve results from (apple or google)

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The identifier for the application you would like to retrieve reviews for

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: The two-letter code for the language you want results in (ISO-639-1). Optional

api_list.name: Autocomplete
api_list.description: Fetch a list of autocomplete terms for a given search term

required_parameters.name: store
required_parameters.description: The app store that you would like to retrieve reviews from (apple or google)

required_parameters.name: term
required_parameters.description: The search term you would like to retrieve autocomplete results for

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: The two-letter code for the language you want results in (ISO-639-1). Optional

api_list.name: App details
api_list.description: Fetch app store details for a given application

required_parameters.name: store
required_parameters.description: The app store that you would like to retrieve results from (apple or google)

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The identifier for the application you would like to retrieve results for

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: The two-letter code for the language you want results in (ISO-639-1). Optional
